definition: seniority in the family or clan/position in the family hierarchy
lifetime/generation/group of people/class/classifier for generations/(literary) classifier for people

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: Men, women and children are put on the family holiday attire, followed by the seated position in the family hierarchy.
sentences.chinese: 全家男女老少都穿上节日的盛装，按辈分依次坐定。

sentences.english: She ranks as my junior in the clan.

definition: of the same generation/person of the same generation/peer
lifetime/generation/group of people/class/classifier for generations/(literary) classifier for people
to address sb directly by name (idiom)/to address sb by name without using an honorific title (indicating either familiarity or overfamiliarity)
collateral relative (descended from a common ancestor but through different lines)
